Text:
This is a book on how to draw/paint a picture of a vehicle. I was looking for a book on how to spraypaint an actual car. 

If you have a book on spraypainting cars, would you kindly post that also? Thanks!

@ annabelle31 . . . 
I dont know who you confused this book for a book on painting your car.. The title gives it away "Digital Painting Tutorials".. not to mention the picture on display. Either way. I dont have a pdf on spraypainting cars. I would go to a professional for that anyways. Theres alot of experience you need before you actually paint your car that you wont really get from a PDF. Its a hands-on experience that you need to undergo. And i doubt that you have "practice cars" to practice on. and a can of spraypaint isnt the way to go. Hope you find what you are looking for. Have a good day. :-)
Thank you again Oceanhawk... i wish for more upload like this... its insanely helpfull

Hey man, thanks for all the work you've done uploading these for us.  After an acid trip I picked up drawing, and you've really helped me get into it. 
Please keep up the excellent work!
